lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: "If not you, who? If not now, when?" These are the words of a Metal of Honor recipient. These word sprouted from conflict but certainly can and should be applied to prosperity and self-empowerment around the planet. We are very happy to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a self-employed General Contractor performing repair and renovation work here in the San Francisco Bay Area. I have been in business for 28 years. My wife works at Kaiser Hospital in ongoing procedural health education for nurses and doctors.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: Poverty is no one's fault. We all have to help each other out.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently finishing my Political Science undergraduate degree. During the summers, I take pictures of tourists dressed up in 19th century costume at Upper Canada Village (a pioneer village).

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: strangers helped me in the past so it is my turn now and I am lucky to be able to do it. We can make this world better one by one.

lender.name: Zack
lender.loan_because:
We have always known that heedless self-interest was bad morals; we know now that it is bad economics.
-FDR Second Inaugural 1937

lender.name: Kris Lozano
lender.loan_because:
We believe educating our children about charity begins with our example. We'd like them to learn that most of the world struggles to survive on what we would consider "disposable income" (Thereby creating gratitude for what we have).
Matthew 24:40 say, "Whatever you did for the least of these brothers of mine...you've done for me."
lender.occupational_info: We both work educating young people about the effects of drugs and alcohol and teach them how they can fulfill their dreams and their potential in life.

lender.name: Robert.J
lender.loan_because: social investing has the highest dividends - our BIG family feels less pain. The funds were established to allow children and grandchildren to learn about social investing, how to count their blessings, and how precious a gift it is to ourselves to help others
lender.occupational_info: ...i am long since retired, and off on a new sailing adventure...

lender.name: Patrice Herrera
lender.loan_because: I grew up in poverty and I am blessed now and want to bless others. This is a fantastic way to give people the opportunity to have a permanent solution to their situation instead of giving them the proverbial fish to feed them for a day, only to have them back in a position of need tomorrow. I want to give them a hand-up rather than a hand-out. It is wonderful to be able to help provide a lasting solution to someone that is perhaps thousands of miles away. They are intelligent and talented people who were born, or had sometimes fallen, into unfortunate circumstances; they are mothers, fathers, daughters, and sons...not just charity cases to be pitied. This program and its Field Partners enable people to have dignity and allow them to be an integral part of developing their community's economy, which in turn helps many more people thrive. In turn, those communities need to be encouraged to help those who are truly unable to support themselves - the orphans, those with severe disabilities, the elderly, etc. I love this program!!!

lender.name: Kristine
lender.loan_because: I think it's fun!
lender.occupational_info: I figure out what products my company should make, and what price they should be sold at, to optimize profitability.

lender.name: Olivia
lender.loan_because: i believe that all people should have the resources they need to be successful and happy in their own right and by their own means.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I thought this was a dating site. :) Also, I believe in crisis relief. Or sending 20 bucks so that a kid gets basic immunizations or clean drinking water. But the real goal here is that humans have food, shelter, and access to education and healthcare. The real goal is to give a child a chance to reach her potential. So how do we move towards that goal? I can't buy it.
lender.occupational_info: I buy life insurance on major corporations and then hope they die.

lender.name: john South Miami, FL
lender.loan_because: My daughter, Chloe, gave me a $50 KIVA gift certificate.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the Florida Department of Transportation. My job is to obtain the various environmental permits needed to build and improve the stateroads and bridges in South Florida. In order to obtain these permits, I must demonstrate that the construction projects will not harm the environment.

lender.name: Rudy Chery
lender.loan_because: when I have I give.
lender.occupational_info: I can’t complain, how are things working out on your side?

lender.name: Jimmy
lender.loan_because: I am blessed so much by God that I would like to share His Love to others too!
lender.occupational_info: I am currently serving as a youth pastor. There's nothing better than to serve my Lord and Savior Jesus Christ.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: we are all one.
lender.occupational_info: I teach my son at home, and I help others do the same for their children.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.occupational_info: health care

lender.name: Kia
lender.loan_because: I want to help other entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I am a designer and illustrator.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I believe we all should work together to help one another. We are ONE in this big global village.
lender.occupational_info: By day, I help facilitate gifting to help reduce the amount of things that go to waste. In my free time, I am a mixed media artist who always has more projects in her mind than those which are completed. :)

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to succeed and I want to help individuals get that chance to succeed

lender.name: Kadey's Angels
lender.loan_because: This loan is in part a gift on behalf of our friend Kadey on her 33rd birthday, and in part of our desire to make a small difference in this world.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of friends who are website designers, educators, online marketers and event planners.

lender.name: Kazoo
lender.loan_because: I want to be part of the growing small business entrepreneurship all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: We have lots of fun learning English and a lot other things together and from each other.

lender.name: Nichole
lender.loan_because: I care about the world around me.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I want to do my part to end extreme poverty. I believe this is one of the best ways to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I am making documentaries to help fuel the progress of organizations like Kiva. My production company is called Speak Up Productions (speakupproductionsco.com) and I am currently directing the film Give A Damn? (giveadamndoc.com) Give A Damn?'s goal is to challenge the next generation to end extreme poverty through a film & movement.

lender.name: Brian Gibbs
lender.loan_because: I loan because I believe everyone should have the opportunity to succeed and that money shouldn't be the thing that holds them back.
lender.occupational_info: My company develops and designs custom websites for small/medium businesses.

lender.name: Soroptimist Thunder Bay
lender.loan_because: We want to help improve the lives of women.
lender.occupational_info: We are all professional women actively working and retired

lender.name: Ira
lender.loan_because: my children (see pix) gave me a gift of a loan certificate which I am using to better the lives of people who with a little help can better their lives and the lives of those close to them
lender.occupational_info: I am a senior executive in an insurance brokerage firm. helping to protect businesses and individuals from financial disaster

lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: Helping women entrepreneurs is the most meaningful way I can help.
lender.occupational_info: Using beauty to encourage business

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I've been lucky enough throughout my life to be able to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a drug manufacturing facility. We work to maintain a clean and sterile environment to help ensure drug safety

lender.name: Ellis
lender.loan_because: I want to foster free enterprise and entrepreneurship around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 10 and 11 year old boys and girls in a public school in a town of approximately 20,000 people in the northwest corner of the United States.

lender.name: Demetria
lender.loan_because: It is essential in our global world that we work towards the success of all peoples. We as a world cannot be free unless all people are safe, fed and know we are looking out for each other.
lender.occupational_info: I work with women as a midwife, doula and train women to be doulas. Doulas support women in labor to have the safe birth they want.

lender.name: Ernie
lender.loan_because: having seen what just a few dollars can do to improve lives in poorer countries, it is nice to just try to help out a bit.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: When I read about Kiva, assisting people to succeed on their own seemed like a good idea
lender.occupational_info: Capturing life and posting it

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I like to help people become successful in making the world a better place.

lender.name: Bad Cat
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Trying to make angry people happy.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with health, family, freedom., and meaningful work. I want to help others achieve their own dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I teach at a small college. My students are in their 1st and 2nd year of college. I teach study skills, humanities, and multicultural studies.

lender.name: Melody
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student in Los Angeles, California.

lender.name: Laurent et Michèle
lender.loan_because: it's usefull for people all other the world
lender.occupational_info: work in a hospital for children

lender.name: Arthur
lender.loan_because: can't think of anything better to do with my money
lender.occupational_info: jack of all trades, master of none

lender.name: Andreas
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who are helping themselves.

lender.name: Giulia
lender.loan_because: empowering is more powerful than just giving...
lender.occupational_info: I design digital services to address people real needs. I strongly believe everyone should have the opportunity to live the life they dream. Thank you Kiva!

lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I manage a community health centre that serves the most marginalized and vulnerable in the community.

lender.name: Chad & Melissa
lender.loan_because: We want to help those with less oportunity.

lender.name: Emmanuel
lender.loan_because: Always i wanted to become Entrepreneur which would lift my economic and made others Entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: My work need a lot of patient and obey because is very diffcult job to climb Mount Killimanjaro the highest mt in Africa,Very cold.Wind,also you must be able to cross culture because you work with different people from different country.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: I have little. They have less.

lender.name: Massimo
lender.loan_because: People in the "first world" like to complain all the time about those poors and ingnorants who pollute their existence. They are ignorant themselves and they lose the mean of solidarity. Microcredit is the best way to help some people to DO something and control their own existence: now they see a brighter future. No charity, just some real help.
lender.occupational_info: I consult companies on strategy, organisation, governance, quality and security of their information system (so their entire company). I also help them to innovate.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: I study organizational psychology. I hope to work with organizations to make jobs more meaningful and enjoyable.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: it's a great joy to be able to reach out in this way..
lender.occupational_info: I am currently writing a Ph.D. thesis about the history of the theology of lending money I am preparing to be a teacher at the college and seminary level.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I fly airplanes for the United States Navy.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: I have known want and the kindness of others. Now that God has given me the means, I can give back.
lender.occupational_info: I work 500 miles away from my home for 2 weeks at a time. I work on the oil pipeline in Alaska.

lender.name: Nicola
lender.loan_because: it makes sense.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: I was given a credit of $25.00 as a gift and enjoyed the process of looking at the loans and helping out.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with marital problems, and help people do wills sell their homes.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in my life and want to help give a headstart to others less fortunate.

lender.name: Irina
lender.loan_because: I must.

lender.name: C.J.
lender.loan_because: I highly respect any business person who has an entrepreneurial spirit! I think that Kiva.org is a great avenue to encourage and support businesses and individuals around the world. I am specifically signing up for providing loans, in honor of our dear family dog, Sadie, who recently died. I want to honor her life by providing money to a wonderful cause.

lender.name: Khayree
lender.loan_because: I'm about giving back and helping people who might not be as fortunate as we are in our country,and I think this is a tremendous way of bridging the gaps and bringing the world together.
lender.occupational_info: I own an Independent Record label by name of RICTASCALE RECORDS LLC, and work can get stressful and time consuming but this is my dream and god gave me the talent and the means to make it happen so I gotta do whatever it takes to get the job done at the end of the day.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel like I'm making a difference, and I know that these people need the money much more than I do.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a counselor at a summer camp for individuals with special needs. I plan to pursue music therapy as a career.

lender.name: Rogers
lender.loan_because: I want to start up my own Business which can sustain the community and our country at large.
lender.occupational_info: Basically I want to do the Business which has already attained experience because I can ran it the reason being I know the skills involved and it's strategies.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: As a follower of Jesus I am called to put my faith into action. One way I strive to do this is by showing love to the poor and oppressed. I'm fortunate enough to have resources to share, and this is a great way to share what God has given me.

lender.name: Petr
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes it really easy and fun to provide other people with needed funds.

lender.name: Fred
lender.loan_because: I think these small loans can make a difference for entrepreneurs in the world. Hopefully more potential lenders can get the message and make these loans!
lender.occupational_info: Semi-retired business person. I know what it means to struggle starting a new business.

lender.name: Rini
lender.loan_because: Realizing I am a happy woman with lots of opportunities and a wonderful life, I asked my guests at my 50th birthday to give a present to another woman around the globe to built her own life.

lender.name: Randy
lender.loan_because: I am glad that there are people out there, whose lives I can touch in a meaningful way. It is good to know that a small act really can make a huge difference in another's life.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: We are all responsible to give to each other freely of the blessings we have.
lender.occupational_info: I am going to teach high school students Spanish when I am done with school!

lender.name: Leighanna
lender.loan_because: i believe in equalizing social justice

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I want to help my fellow.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I like to help out.
lender.occupational_info: I work with pipes and valves in a big factory

lender.name: Robleh
lender.loan_because: I admire all these enterprising people and I believe encouraging their creativity is the best way to help them.

lender.name: Meg
lender.loan_because: It is needed and I can help.
lender.occupational_info: I work with teachers, parents, students, and community members to create learning environments that inspire teaching and learning and create community

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: We're all connected.

lender.name: Maren
lender.loan_because: I think that giving someone an opportunity to make their life better for themselves is a greater thing to do than to just simply give them a couple meals or temporary shelter. Teach a man to fish... right?

lender.name: Lyle
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do!! Just image what the world would be like if every country and every person had the same opportunities to be successful and enjoy life!!

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are attempting improve their circumstance through entrepreneurial endeavors.
lender.occupational_info: I develop system protection and control designs for an electrical utility company. The electrical configuration that I design monitors and protects the equipment associated with the power system.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: my "little" can be someone elses "a lot".
lender.occupational_info: i take photographs

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: To give the same opportunity given to me.

lender.name: The Mega-Gs
lender.loan_because: so many people have helped us throughout our lives.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: Jesus has a heart for the poor, and I want to be like Jesus.

lender.name: Dolores
lender.loan_because: I like the direct connection Kiva offers between lender and borrower. I like watching the people I help succeed. And, because I am able.
lender.occupational_info: Purchasing agent for a promotional products company.

lender.name: Billy
lender.loan_because: I want to help people less fortunate than I.
lender.occupational_info:
My work involves the transfer of the risk of a loss, from one entity to another, in exchange for a premium,
Example: Fire burns your business building and business property. I provide coverage to replace your building and all your business property for a premium.

lender.name: Machelle
lender.loan_because: It feels great to help people start businesses that will give them the ability to improve their lives. A relatively small amount can make a big difference.

lender.name: Barth
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Computers

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference and give back because I am so blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I help organizations achieve their goals through improved internal communication, planning and manager-employee relationships.

lender.name: Tom & Josette
lender.loan_because: I love micro credits. I think they are a GREAT way to improve people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a group of computer programmers.

lender.name: AuntieKyleKelseyPatrick
lender.loan_because: As a family we are very blessed and we want to give back to those less fortunate than us. Giving like this can help others have a better life, and it makes us feel good.
lender.occupational_info: Auntie Laura helps get computing technology to large global companies all around the world. Kyle, Kelsey & Patrick are students in Wisconsin who are becoming "global citizens" through travel with Auntie and the understanding of people & cultures all around the world.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others. Everyone is entitled to a better life.

lender.name: My kids Jesse & Desiree
lender.loan_because: I am a single mom who is trying hard to get an education to take care of my children, and this is the least I can do to help another person in need. My children have offered to help with this loan so they will get to see how much power they hold to do good.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time graduate student working on my social work degree. I will use this degree to help those in need, those without a voice, those who the world thinks has no power.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I've had a really great run the past nine years. Before then it was a rough time, but thanks to a generous private lender I was able to complete a MSc degree. I repaid her, and now with Kiva I can do the same on a smaller scale. What goes around, comes around.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to operate printing presses. These are sold by my employer all over the world.

lender.name: Wes
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Manager for a Trucking company

lender.name: Iril
lender.loan_because: I like to help people with their dreams of a better future and life for themselves and their family. I like KIVA because I can choose what/who to support. I am most interested in supporting farming and agriculture projects.
lender.occupational_info: I am the editor of a magazine about how to take care of your house and garden.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student.

lender.name: Dennis & Penny
lender.occupational_info: I design, build, and maintain computer systems

lender.name: Magictrix
lender.loan_because: Coz we are all in this together
lender.occupational_info: I'm being raised by two beautiful girls, and work part time as a support person for a woman with some physical & communication limitations

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: It is an easy way to help others fight poverty and improve the lives of their familes and communities

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because: I believe that its every persons duty, if possible to give back to those that are less fortunate
lender.occupational_info: I work for a Worlwide recognized brand and provide products and services to people around the world

lender.name: nys
lender.loan_because: I know I would want someone to help me out too.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people who are willing to work, as opposed to giving a handout.

lender.name: Jay, Andria, Zach
lender.loan_because: Periodic lapses in near-perfect self involvement.
lender.occupational_info: Siting at computers all day getting fatter.

lender.name: David C.
lender.loan_because: I want to share my abundance with people and fulfill their dreams across the world!
lender.occupational_info: I support companies' local and wide area networks so their computers can stay up and functional.

lender.name: Gretchen
lender.loan_because: It feels good to directly lend my love, support , and encouragement to individual people for their specific endeavors.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit organization that helps doctors give books to children who don't have them.

lender.name: Jim & Ann
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed and believe we are called to be a blessing to others.

lender.name: Scotty
lender.occupation: Retired U.S. Air Force - Now an AF Consultant
lender.loan_because: it's time for us to all come together or we're all in BIG trouble!
lender.occupational_info: I served 23 years in the U.S. Air Force and retired at the age of 40 in January 2004. I now work for a firm handling many government contracts including my project involving Air Force Data Systems.

lender.name: Irene
lender.loan_because: my daughter in law gave me a gift certificate

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I am spending so much money on things I don't really need, so I guess I should give at least some to people who do something useful with it.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: "What ever you do for the least of these, you do unto Me".
lender.occupational_info: I take pictures of people. :)

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: Something small can do so much

lender.name: Lillian
lender.loan_because: I can personally help an individual across the world.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I've been very blessed in many ways in my life. People helped me at different times, and it's payback time. And this is the best program I've come across in years.
lender.occupational_info: I work in diverse communication and theatre-related fields

lender.name: Matt & Megan Wagner
lender.loan_because: We want to share our hope for a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I work on computers for a large bank in the United States. We also own a small business that converts music collections for use on computers.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I think providing budding capitalists with the money to accomplish their dreams is the most effective way of improving the living standards of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am in my 3rd year of law school at Tulane and will be returning to West Virginia (Wild and Wonderful) after graduation.

lender.name: Nel
lender.loan_because:
I hope to help Moluccan people who wants to build up their village in the Moluccan.
There are many Moluccans who do the best, but they do not have the money.

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because: I have experienced need in my life . . . dire need at times. I know first hand the feeling of relief that results in receiving desperately needed aid. That is why I am so pleased to have stumbled upon this program. The loans I make are in memory of my mother, Olga, and in honor of my father Nicholas, both of whom shared and share so generously with my brother and me. Glory to God for all things!

lender.name: Spenjorba
lender.loan_because: we like to share what we have with people
lender.occupational_info: We go to school and learn math, social studies, Japanese, and drama

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I love my brothers and sisters & as a wise King once said, "when ye are in the service of your fellow beings ye are only in the service of your God." King Benjamin
lender.occupational_info: I Serve & Protect. It’s like being a Jedi, but without a lightsaber. :)

lender.name: Henrietta
lender.loan_because: I can empower people to improve their lives without demeaning them with hand outs.

lender.name: Joel
lender.occupation: Retired - Owned Stores & Computer Sys. businesses

lender.name: Jasmin
lender.loan_because: I know how lucky I am to have grown up in a country without war, to have a good education and a stable economy. If fate had brought my parents "back home" , it could be my family or even myself applying for a micro finance loan today. I strongly believe in helping others to help themselves and a small loan to start a business can change lives.
lender.occupational_info: I spend most of my time in front of a computer.

lender.name: Dass
lender.loan_because: If you have the ability to help someone, why wouldn't you?
lender.occupational_info: I'm a New Zealand university student with a part time job in retail.

lender.name: urban grind
lender.loan_because: It is the kindness of others that has seen my business become what it is. It has also been the good heart of those that never doubted that I could do anything and that is what I want to offer others. All our loans are funded by our tips jar. So the loans are funded by our customers and staff who donate their tips to Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I own a coffee shop. Through my coffee shop I build a local community. I want you to know that you are a part of my world.

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: its the least i can do.

lender.name: Luis
lender.loan_because: I feel good helping people
lender.occupational_info: I work in the mobile phone industry

lender.name: Ram
lender.loan_because: they will put it to better use than me

lender.name: Stephanie and Daniel
lender.loan_because: I believe that one should "be the change you wish to see in the world" (~ Mahatma Gandhi). There is no reason for poverty to exist, and I believe micro-finance to be one of the best methods through which the world can achieve the goal of eradicating poverty world-wide.

lender.name: CIMBA
lender.loan_because: We are building an ongoing fund to enable students to participate in socially responsible activities currently our efforts are focused through KIVA
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of students based in Asolo, Italy.

lender.name: jiri
lender.loan_because: Everyone in U. S. can do it.
lender.occupational_info: green building, using natural, cheap and available materials.

lender.name: Neil
lender.loan_because: the gap between the developed world and the developing world is apalling.

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: I believe that we were created to be helpful to others. Besides: I'm a teacher--I still think that I can make a small difference.
lender.occupational_info: I teach languages, and a part of that is promoting an understanding and appreciation of differences in people and cultures.

lender.name: Kurt
lender.loan_because: I makes me feel good and I enjoy helping entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: Executive in a garment company that designs and manufactures apparel for US major retailers

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: I believe that, at some point, everybody on this planet needs a helping hand. I've been through hardships in my life and there were family and friends to help me through. This is the very least that I can do to help others.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I don't consider money an end unto itself, and I'm happiest making other people happy.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Giving someone a better day today, (than yesterday), will help them toward an even better tomorrow.
lender.occupational_info: Started out serving my country (as a WWII & Korean War Marine)... became a VISTA in 2005 and spent a year on Katrina recovery...then as an AmeriCorps VISTA Leader for California's San Joaquin Valley Region. Currently I have gone back to being just a VISTA... working on a new VISTA project we have named "Main Street Values." As may be obvious I am still determined to go out in service to my country. I'm 83, my heart operates on a pacemaker/defibrilator and I can't run a mile in under 4 minutes... but I will get to the finish line with a smile on my face... was I the oldest active VISTA??? A good question... in search of an answer.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: Its nice to be able to help people who want to work to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: After working as a chemical engineer I have now 'retired' and work in a school.

lender.loan_because: I've been lucky.

lender.name: acissej zenatro
lender.loan_because: because of the wonderful things that are

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by the people I loan to. I admire their willingness to work hard to improve the lives of their families and themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I provide training and technical help to small communities in treating and maintaining their drinking water and waste water systems.

lender.name: Edward
lender.occupational_info: Engineering Philosophy

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I believe in people helping people.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I like to help those who are working hard to improve their family's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I buy chemical raw materials which my company uses to help clean water around the world.

lender.name: Vincent
lender.loan_because: any gesture can change the world

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: "to whom much is given, much will be required"

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I have travelled extensively and found that people can be ethical and "good" regardless of where they were born. I have done well and want to help others achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Retired military helicopter pilot.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people help them selves and get a better life.

lender.name: Havar
lender.loan_because: "You must be the change you want to see in the world.." Mahatma Gandhi

lender.name: Marshall
lender.loan_because:
I believe that Kiva, and the process of lending money to entrepreneurs in third world countries is an amazing way to provide assistance, and allows me to do my small part to better the world.
It's makes me feel more alive and part of the world when I see that entrepreneurs around the world can benefit from all of our investments
lender.occupational_info: I am an international currency dealer. When someone wants to invest in the currency of a war torn country I get that currency for them.

lender.name: Ilya
lender.loan_because: it's fun.
lender.occupational_info: I manage web development projects (like web sites such as kiva.org) from start to finish.

lender.name: Tom,Tracey,Sofia & Alex
lender.loan_because: we can, and it is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I am very grateful for the blessings and abundance in my life. I want to share this with others and help them grow abundance in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help managers discover better ways of working with thier staff to improve their performance and their satisfaction at work.

lender.name: Bruce and Brenda
lender.loan_because: I am constantly amazed what a little bit of money in the right hands will do.
lender.occupational_info: I work with mathematics and statistics for the U.S. Army

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: I want nothing more in my entire life than to make a positive impact in someones life.
lender.occupational_info: I am mostly a student, but recently got a new job in which I work with individuals who have mental and physical disabilities and help them live relatively independent lives.

lender.name: Elias
lender.loan_because: my auntie made me by giving me a kiva gift as a first birthday present. Bless her!

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I want to help women support themselves and their families. I hope these loans improve the quality of their lives and communities.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the fund-raising database for a nonprofit organization.

lender.name: Kamini
lender.loan_because: It seems like the best way to do something good with the money I make, and to be a positive force in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I conduct research on groundwater contamination and teach at a large public university in the U.S.

lender.name: Phil & Hillary
lender.loan_because: We believe that as followers of Christ we are called to give. I love the idea and the action of micro-lending and would love to see it evolve even further!

lender.name: Manish
lender.loan_because: Makes me feel better when "Loan" and not "alms" are received by someone deserving.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Nate and Leah
lender.loan_because: We've been given plenty and want to share that with others.
lender.occupational_info: Leah teaches college students; Nate writes about computers and the Internet.

lender.name: Lou & Sue
lender.loan_because: We can, it is good, we choose to.

lender.name: Adrian
lender.loan_because: you should.

lender.name: anita
lender.loan_because: I loan because I am able to, and because I believe I am my sisters' keeper.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Helping people create business opportunities makes for more jobs and improves the world. Kiva is a great organization. And I want to have a part of making the world a better place!
lender.occupational_info: I work for the largest Job Site in the US and work with employers to find good employees

lender.name: Cope
lender.loan_because: I'd rather give up my bank's 3% interest rate to help others

lender.name: jean
lender.loan_because: it feels good to be good
lender.occupational_info: understanding busisness problems and devising concrete solutions.

lender.name: Grerrit & Jeanette
lender.loan_because: God gave us many blessings.and we wish others the same.

lender.name: Factory Strategies Group
lender.loan_because: To support manufacturing and business entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: Resources, tools, and communities supporting lean manufacturing and lean enterprise excellence.

lender.name: Pingo.com Phone Cards
lender.loan_because: We are a global prepaid calling card provider. We work with people to make international calls worldwide. We loan to help the global community and donate global phone cards to several global charity organizations as well as supporting are troops overseas.
lender.occupational_info: www.Pingo.com is a global telecom voip provider that helps people make international calls worldwide. We provide a clean prepaid global phone card service to keep the world connected for a whole lot less.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: By loaning rather than giving, not only can the funds be reused and make more of a difference, but the borrowers learn how to manage their money as a business, which helps them long after the money is repaid.
lender.occupational_info: Mathematics

lender.name: Emmy
lender.loan_because: I loan because I enjoy the feeling of knowing you helped someone.
lender.occupational_info: I don't work I am still in school

lender.name: Natalia
lender.loan_because: Thanks to my daughter's present -K iva gift certificate, I can take part in realization of the dreams and ideas which probably can make the world better.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I want to have a positive impact in the world and I believe I can accomplish this by helping other people.
lender.occupational_info: When I graduate this year I will be an Occupational Therapist (OT). An OT helps people to be independent and participatae in areas of : self care, work and leisure activities by helping them to overcome barriers (whether they be physical, or environmental).

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I want to help people be successful.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: helping people to have a smiling spirit

lender.name: Martene, Pat &Family

lender.name: Claudia-Marit
lender.loan_because: Claudia and I chose to be entrepeneurs (selling cakes to raise capital), so that we could be "international venture capitalists". Oh yes, it was a project for school too.

lender.name: Natálie
lender.loan_because: although I'm still removed from the situation, it helps in a sustainable manner. Even if I don't have much I can still share what I DO have.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student and a gardener. I work on a farm that educates children about the natural world and how we grow the food we eat.

lender.name: Zach
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance...

lender.name: DawnZ
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with tremendous opportunities to succeed and would like to bless others.
lender.occupational_info: My job involves implementing and managing software systems to support company operations.

lender.name: Powell Family
lender.loan_because: I feel that we have been given the opportunity, through our own success in life, to help others with their dreams. This was only made possible by our faith in Jesus Christ.
lender.occupational_info: Our company installs, maintains and repairs heating and air conditioning systems for local businesses.

lender.name: WMM
lender.loan_because: It's important we all find ways to help each other.

lender.name: joshua
lender.loan_because: i believe in doing the right thing no matter what ,no matter what it takes, no matter what the cost and i believe this to be the perfect type of charity not a hand out but to help people help themselfs
lender.occupational_info: i fight for the right thing, i fight for others

lender.loan_because: It makes sensce

lender.loan_because: its fun, its good, its easy, and why not?

lender.loan_because: of my family situation i need some money for my personal use and i am going to start a orphange pls support me
lender.occupational_info: i think there is no word to express this but i need help

lender.loan_because: a little help goes a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I provide doctors and researchers antibodies to one day help cure cancer.

lender.name: Luís
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to stimulate the world economies (long term impact) and helping people at the same time (short term impact).
lender.occupational_info: I help companies make strategic decisions.

lender.name: Kara
lender.loan_because: I like to travel in developing nations. Donating to Kiva helps me do something to raise the standard of living of people like the ones I meet in my travels.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a 3D virtual world connected to the Internet.

lender.name: alex
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.occupational_info: I am a director for a Healthcare organization in Manhattan.

lender.name: Franklin
lender.loan_because: Karma, my credit card charges me 24.99% then paypal takes out it share, so it's not free, but I have an opportunity to help a little, until the billionaires find out they can't take it with them.
lender.occupational_info: I can locate a good property investment many people will over-look, because of their insensitivity to the ambiance or detail.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I can.........and it is a great way to empower people and share what we have.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse, but have been an at-home mom for 10 years. I am raising 3 wonderful boys.

lender.name: Donny Tj
lender.loan_because: I have a website, www.pengusaha.biz . It's a FREE classified ads site. I plan it to be a foundation of my economic and my life in the future. but i need to promote it convencionally (traditionaly), by advertising in a newspaper. In Indonesia, a web portal will be popular if it is promoted seriously in both 2 method: Internet and convencional. But I have not enough fund to make it happen. I need about USD300 or more.
lender.occupational_info: I worked in front of a computer at my little home (actualy, I rent it monthly). Sometimes I call someone or my friends to speak our strategic business plans. Sometimes too, I develop web-based applications for a new customer. But I have no marketing skill to reach bigger number of customer. So, I ask my friends to do it with profit sharing.

lender.name: Robert and Jackie
lender.loan_because: We want to share our blessings and help others succeed in their lives
lender.occupational_info: We work with technology to improve education and other social programs

lender.name: Leanne
lender.occupation: english as a second language instructor

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I have a small business that helps coconut farmers.

lender.name: achmad
lender.loan_because: I need Money

lender.name: Charlotte
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful thing to be part of a movement of social investors who are committed to empowering people to grow their own business.
lender.occupational_info: I am a lecturer in global studies at RMIT university in Melbourne, Australia. My research interests focus on how development organisations are using the internet to support development and social change - go Kiva!

lender.name: Marcus Rauchfuss
lender.loan_because: I can touch other people's lifes.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: it's a privilege to contribute to these inspiring entrepreneurs.

lender.name: michelle
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves to be successful
lender.occupational_info: i help people make changes in their lives---from where they are right now to where they really want to be

lender.name: Bunny
lender.loan_because: I belive we are all connected in our hardships and joy which are both better if shared.
lender.occupational_info: Support an executive(s) in their daily work day.

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a hand up in life when they need it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired high school Spanish teacher.

lender.name: Amari
lender.loan_because: Helping others is important to me.

lender.name: Adriana
lender.loan_because: It is the most direct way I can help someone improve their own economic situation. / Es la forma mas directa que yo conosco para ayudar a una persona mejorar su propria situacion economica.
lender.occupational_info: I care for new mothers and their infants. / Cuido a las mamas recien paridas y a los recien nacidos.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: Of our love of Africa, whose people blessed us with two beautiful daughters; to repay in some small way, to contribute, and join in making life a little better a little bit at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I help families and children learn how to resolve problems, do better in school and be better friends to help each other.

lender.name: Charitable Giving
lender.loan_because: I like the feeling I get inside that comes from knowing I've helped enrich the lives of international global residents. Reaching out to help your fellow man - - just because you can - - is something that shouldn't be missed. Tell your friends about Kiva and the wonderful impact they make on a global scale. It truly is a win/win situation for all involved.
lender.occupational_info: I strive to help others see the joys in joy life by spreading good cheer and giving positive encouragement. Sports are a terrific outlet for stress, and a chance to spend time with those who share common interests. Although it sometimes can't be avoided, nobody wants to work out in the field all day or be tied to their desk all day; people innately want to have fun! Get out and play with your friends and family whenever you can - - softball, bocce ball, soccer, hiking, even a walk in the park - - fun moments in sports and nature translate into good memories that stay with you long after you're finished playing.

lender.name: Mary Kelly Mc
lender.loan_because: I admire these industrious, creative entrepreneurs. I want to contribute to their success so that they, in turn, will be able to employ other people. I am grateful that I am able to participate in this program.
lender.occupational_info: I worked for many years as a computer programmer for a large corporation.

lender.name: Heron
lender.loan_because: I believe in the potential of mirco-finance to create autonomy and financial security. More micro-loans! Less world bank!

lender.name: Paul Bussey
lender.loan_because: It is a simple but powerful way to help someone improve their life. Simply by jump starting their entrepreneurial efforts.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because:
It takes people to help people.
"You must be the change you wish to see in the world," Gandhi.
lender.occupational_info:
I encourage people and companies to get involved in meaningful hands-on volunteer projects that improve The Human Condition, while promoting social responsibility and teamwork.
I'm also a Kiva loan editor and the founder and captain of the Humanist team on Kiva.

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Michelle & Nick Hansen
lender.loan_because: We believe in investing in people who are willing to work hard for the dream of a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I work in medicine and take care of people who have bad arthritis. I help them to feel better by prescribing medicines or recommending and assisting with surgery. My husband is an entrepreneur. He has a custom men's clothing business in Chicago, Illinois. We both know the extreme dedication and unending hours of work it takes to have your own business. We are happy we are in a position to work toward achieving not only our dreams but helping others with the ability to fulfill their own.

lender.name: Tikkun Olam
lender.loan_because: Helping other people is the right thing to do. As a group of friends we practice Tikkun Olam, fixing the world, by doing this.
lender.occupational_info: Our work is to empower people. We help them to help themselves by giving them the tools (money) to make a profit out of their hard work. Then they can feed and clothe their families a little easier.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: My passion to help others obtain their highest potential and Kiva provides me an opportunity to bless others lives.
lender.occupational_info: My role is to assist members of the US House of Representatives serve their constituents by providing assistance to them so they can access the House network through email, internet, etc.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I love to see people succeed.

lender.name: Juancarlos
lender.loan_because: What to help

lender.name: PD's family
lender.loan_because: I have the ability and resources to help someone that might otherwise not have the opportunity to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: Proving that the design of the built environment can have a positive impact on lives

lender.name: Zach
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs help.

lender.name: Sylvi & Nils
lender.loan_because: We believe the kingdom Jesus teached about, can be experienced here and now as a foretast of the coming. The loans hopefully can make a difference in an unfair society.

lender.name: Tish
lender.loan_because: I believe in people.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I want to help, because I was helped.
lender.occupational_info: I help kids to learn and grow.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I have been so blessed and feel it is my responsibility to help others... especially those who are truly interested in improving their quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: As a recruiter, I help companies find employees who are qualified to work for them.

lender.name: Hafiz Zahirudin
lender.loan_because: I Can!!!

lender.name: Woodrow Wilson School
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to help the global community and make a difference. Students in grades Pre-K to 8 raised money during our Random Acts of Kindness campaign. Now we are choosing businesses and watching our money change the lives of others around the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are an integrated arts elementary school that believes in community service. Our Random Acts of Kindness campaign provides students with the opportunity to learn community and world service through fund-raising and service projects that focus on "it is far greater a gift to give of oneself then to receive". Such programs foster in children a love, a tolerance, and a respect for humanity...the beginning of a finer and kinder world.

lender.name: Sylwia & Tom
lender.loan_because: We care

lender.name: Erendira
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in women's lives, especially in Mexico and the rest of Latin America.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my family and work on computers and on the internet.

lender.name: Mystic
lender.loan_because: Options: A. Give a fish, eat for a day; B. Teach to fish, eat forever. In my view, this is Option B (or, at least, a variant thereof); it allows me to make a difference, one lesson at a time.
lender.occupational_info: Job description: Long periods of sleep, punctuated by intense periods of nap, with occasional instances of frenzied activity during suppertime.

lender.name: Marge
lender.loan_because: I want people to develop their own businesses and be independent
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: Dominic
lender.loan_because: Its the responsible thing to do. We are the richest country in the world and in my opinion, all of the money is not spent where it could do the most good. Kiva allows me to see who i am helping.

lender.name: Bud
lender.loan_because: People need a helping hand sometimes
lender.occupational_info: IT Director and small business owner on the side

lender.name: Patty from Florida
lender.loan_because: I love to help others less fortunate achieve their dreams
lender.occupational_info: Supply Chain and Logistics

lender.name: Vanja
lender.loan_because: Helping people better themselves improves the quality of life worlwide. As I am in a Third World country, development in Africa and other countries similar, is of great importance to society, not only in the home country, but also worldwide.
lender.occupational_info: I used to manage in a huge retail store in South Africa, but got fired/retrenched due to BEE (Black Employment Empowerment), which specified that 75% of the staff was supposed to be non-caucassian. This sort of mentality within a country is unacceptable. People should have equal rights everywhere. Work should be earned on merit, not the colour of your skin.
